channel.title: Help pleaseee
channel.description:
Whenever I run my jar file this is the error in the run.bat, I reuploaded my cache and used that link, IDK whats wrong :( heres error
THIS BATCH IS FOR DEBUGGING THE EXECUTABLE JAR ONLY DOUBLE-CLICK THE "client.jar" TO RUN IT - Generated by: JAR Maker (http://www.goldenstudios.or.id/) C:\Users\Buffenbarger\Downloads\HaizScape source>java -jar client.jar java.io.FileNotFoundException: nullMaps\mapConfig.txt (The system cannot find th e path specified) at java.io.FileInputStream.open(Native Method) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileInputStream.(Unknown Source) at java.io.FileReader.(Unknown Source) at client.setNewMaps(client.java:81) at client.startUp(client.java:8866) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) java.lang.NullPointerException at java.io.File.(Unknown Source) at Update.(Update.java:25) at client.streamLoaderForName(client.java:4778) at client.startUp(client.java:8876) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:33) at client.run(client.java:6074) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Here6 Exception in thread "AWT-EventQueue-0" java.lang.NullPointerException at client.cleanUpForQuit(client.java:6302) at RSApplet.exit(RSApplet.java:132) at RSApplet.destroy(RSApplet.java:174) at RSApplet.windowClosing(RSApplet.java:442) at java.awt.Window.processWindowEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.processEvent(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Container.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Window.dispatchEventImpl(Unknown Source) at java.awt.Component.dispatchEvent(Unknown Source) at item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

So I just zip the class files in my cache correct?

Read full topic

item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

b00mz1029:

I think it wont unzip right. can someone tell me how to fix? Honestly atm im willing to give co-owner if someone will just teamview me and fix it

Zip the cache properly.[quote=“Int Bauk, post:6, topic:426885”][quote author=b00mz1029 link=topic=529583.msg3865222#msg3865222 date=1324949430]
mapConfig is in the Maps folder in the cache, and whenever I uploaded my cache to dropbox, the entire folder was zipped.
[/quote]

nullmaps\mapsConfig?

and the files, not the actual folder (click on the folder; so you can see all the class files, highlight them all, right click > zip, upload that).[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:

item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Okay, I have noo idea where it got nullmaps or w/e, but whenever I run the jarred run.bat, a ton of nullmain_file_cache.IDX1 files show up and idk what that is.

Read full topic

item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

b00mz1029:

mapConfig is in the Maps folder in the cache, and whenever I uploaded my cache to dropbox, the entire folder was zipped.

nullmaps\mapsConfig?

and the files, not the actual folder (click on the folder; so you can see all the class files, highlight them all, right click > zip, upload that).

Read full topic

item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

where is your mapConfig’s file located; that’s if you even have one?

also did you zip the cache (the files, not the folder itself).

item.title: Help pleaseee
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

cache is attempting to open the denoted file, but can’t find it, i believe o.o.

read more of oracle’s documentation.

Read full topic
